sentences.en: Data recorders also pin-point mechanical faults rapidly, reducing repair times.
sentences.cn: 数据记录仪还能迅速查明机械故障，减少维修次数。

sentences.en: Hardware is the mechanical components of a computer.
sentences.cn: 硬件指的是计算机的机械部分.

sentences.en: He borrowed a mechanical book from me.
sentences.cn: 他从我这儿借了一本力学方面的书.

sentences.en: He was a very mechanical person, who knew a lot about sound.
sentences.cn: 他精通机械，了解许多有关声音的知识。
她的反驳是脱口而出的。

sentences.en: His mechanical calculating engines were the antecedents of the modern computer.
sentences.cn: 他的机械计算机是现代电子计算机的雏形.

sentences.en: It is real prayer, and not mechanical repetition.
sentences.cn: 这是真正的祈祷，不是机械的重复。

sentences.en: Many girls have a kind of mechanical attitude towards sex.
sentences.cn: 许多女孩在性方面会有些率性而为。

sentences.en: Most mechanical devices require oil as a lubricant.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数机械装置都需要用油作为润滑剂。

sentences.en: She bought a mechanical dog for her sister.
sentences.cn: 她为她的妹妹买了一只机械狗.

sentences.en: The company undertakes mechanical work on all types of cars.
sentences.cn: 该公司承接各类汽车的修理工作。

sentences.en: The flight has been cancelled due to mechanical failure .
sentences.cn: 因机械故障航班被取消了。

sentences.en: The flight has been cancelled due to mechanical failure.
sentences.cn: 因机械故障航班被取消了。

sentences.en: The plane had to make an emergency landing because of mechanical problems.
sentences.cn: 飞机因机械故障不得不紧急降落。

sentences.en: The train had stopped due to a mechanical problem.
sentences.cn: 火车因为机械故障停了下来。

sentences.en: The wave is mechanical, the smile is a response to duty.
sentences.cn: 她挥手的动作是机械的, 微笑是为了尽本份.

sentences.en: What aspects of the calendar are artifacts of its old, Mechanical - Age platform?
sentences.cn: 日历的哪些方面是老的机械时代平台的产物呢?在计算机中日历很容易成为连续的日期、星期或者月份的滚动序列, 如图 2-4 所 示 .
